pkgmetadata.longdescription: Quick Response Code (QR Code) / Matrix Barcode Creator // Quick Response codes (QR codes) are a type of matrix bar code and can be used to authenticate transactions, provide access to multi- factor authentication services and enable general data transfer in an image. QR codes use four standardized encoding modes (numeric, alphanumeric, byte/binary, and kanji) to efficiently store data. Matrix barcode generation is performed efficiently in C via the included 'libqrencoder' library created by Kentaro Fukuchi.
